description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(626).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (50,1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[626], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 15 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(25 + x)/(1 - 50 x - x^2), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[25,1251]; [n le 2 select I[n] else 50*Self(n-1)+Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
